title: FS: SGC 5 Marquard portrait and SGC 4 Marquard throwing - SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS: SGC 5 Marquard portrait and SGC 4 Marquard throwing - SOLD
posts.post_content:
I have for sale a nice pair of Marquards with new SGC holders. I will consider trades for other graded HOFers or EPDGs. Just shoot me a PM 

Asking:
$SOLD Marquard portrait
$SOLD Marquard throwing 

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2igBuYj][img]https://farm66.staticflickr.com/65535/49403431418_12559660ed_c.jpg[/img][/url]

[url=https://flic.kr/p/2igEXpD][img]https://farm66.staticflickr.com/65535/49404105687_3911fc0478_c.jpg[/img][/url]
Very nice cards and I love the Portrait.  If I wasn’t saving for a Cobb I’d be a proud owner of that MARQUARD.  GLWS
